entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 10:43 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:43 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of freezing drizzle. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 10:43 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
